Name: Sun Girls
About the game: Sun Girls is a bright puzzle game with 8 levels about beautiful anime girls. It is full of beautiful sea views that are pleasing to the eye. Enjoy the summer atmosphere with beautiful girls in bikinis ^^ Features. 8 levels with beautiful girls and seascapes 3 difficulty levels that differ in the number of puzzle parts Random arrangement of puzzle parts mode for those who want to try their luck A soundtrack that lets you relax during gameplay Easy to play + perfect game in the statistics + game in your collection A large number of achievements Coming soon. Also we want to add some new stuff soon: More Steam achievements (over 500) 8 Steam cards with very beautiful profile backgrounds, badges and emoji
